about_the_game:
Spy Rumble DLC skin #1!

The first one is a horse!
A suspicious looking figure wearing a horse mask has been spotted in Marshmallow City.
Is he an agent on a mission, or a spy trying to sabotage it...
His identity is unknown because his horse face makes it impossible to read his facial expression.
If we approach it with the same horse face, or if we approach it with the same horse face, or if we approach it with the same horse face, we may be able to learn something about it

name: Spy Rumble-Horse Head-

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10
  • Processor: Core i3-3225 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000; Intel Iris Pro 5200
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

short_description: Spy Rumble DLC Skin #1! A mysterious figure wearing a horse mask has been spotted in Marshmallow City. You, too, must don the horse mask and blend in in order to find out who this person is!
